TEXT.TITLE: HOG AND CATTLE SLAUGHTER GUESSTIMATES
TEXT.BODY: Chicago Mercantile Exchange floor traders and commission house representatives are guesstimating today's hog slaughter at about 265,000 to 275,000 head versus 286,000 week ago and 278,000 a year ago. Cattle slaughter is guesstimated at about 128,000 to 132,000 head versus 132,000 week ago and 137,000 a year ago. Reuter
